creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
description: Sleeveless robe of deep blue silk with a design of       butterflies, chiefly blue, in k'ossu, heavily painted.    Painted k'ossu border of butterflies in blue. Brocade braid detail at opening and over hips. Lining of thin pink silk.
dimension: L.56-3/8 in.; L.54-1/8 in. to collar.
title: Sleeveless Robe
